feature: Desktop Jira Clone with OneNote Integration
workflow_rationale: Greenfield multi-service application build requiring: (1) Backend API infrastructure with database and storage integration, (2) Desktop frontend with Electron + React, (3) Real-time collaboration via WebSockets, (4) Comprehensive E2E testing. Feature workflow ensures proper dependency ordering: backend APIs must exist before frontend can consume them.
